name: Pete's Discount Market
description:
In Pete's Discount Market your goal is to incorrectly label and sell as many potions in a minute as possible.

Controls

Move mouse to look around

Left click to pickup items

Right click to label items

P/Pause to open the pause window

R to restart the game

Q/ESC to quit the game

Team

Paul Smith: Artist & Programmer
Tyler Funk: Programmer
Eric Demello: Programmer
